title: [Large-Scale] Design for Enhancing Reusability of Mathematics Curriculum Using Learning Design Transformation Mechanisms

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Fundamental Secondary Mathematics Concepts and Adaptability to Online Learning Environments
context.additional_context: Math curriculum centered on real-life problem-solving, conducted through non-real-time learning activities in digital device-provided environments

learning_goals: Learners can reconstruct existing mathematics curricula in three or more ways using learning design variation mechanisms
Learners can execute modified learning designs with an 80%+ activity completion rate in LMS environments
Learners can demonstrate the educational effectiveness of modified designs by achieving 75+ points on summative assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
